summary: More types to Thalmor to kill. Spawns with normal Thalmor soldiers, works with mods that use the default spawns.
descriptionHtml:
This is a simple mod that add weapons and armor to certain specialist type Thalmor. Specialist types include:

Shock Troopers
Bansheep spellswords
Blackguard assassins
Grenadier crossbowmen
Valenwood conscripts (Bosmer)
Elsweyr conscripts (Khajiit)

There are also boss type characters of each specialist type that spawn at higher levels
Caution, new thalmor characters are balanced according to scaling of Skyrim Unleashed. They are tougher than normal. Then again, it would not be fun if they were pushovers. 

Load after bashed patch if you do not want Thalmor using "non-thalmor" elven weapons.

Recomendded mods: 
Skyrim Unleashed
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25869/?
Lootification
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/32339/?
Lootification custom xml
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/40860/?

Required mods:
Dawnguard
Dragonborn
aMidianBorn Book of Silence (Glass variants lore version)
Bucklers - Shields and Other Armours (complete version)
Crossbow Basic Collection (with leveled lists)
Immersive Weapons
WEAPONIZER Weapons Set
Lost Long Swords
Dark Elven Thalmor-Style Equipment - Standalone
Skyrim Redone
Skyre light weaponry fillout
author: erchan
